title: Installation Guide
author: Seba
summary: Step-by-step instructions on how to install Fabric Boosted using various launchers.

content.paragraph: Before starting, ensure you have Java 17 or newer installed. You can download it from [Adoptium](https://adoptium.net/).
This is the recommended method. Download the [Modrinth App](https://modrinth.com/app), search for 'Fabric Boosted', and click Install. It will automatically handle Java versions and updates.

title: Advanced Performance Tweaks
author: Seba
summary: Maximize your FPS by tweaking specific Sodium and JVM settings.

content.paragraph: For this modpack, we recommend allocating between 4GB and 6GB of RAM. Allocating more than 8GB can actually cause [Garbage Collection Lag](https://spark.lucko.me/docs/guides/Garbage-Collection).
